promptPrefix:
Your task is to come up with a list of 5 real bars and/or restaurants that have been reviewed or can be found in Google maps. The list should be based on the location and preference information included in the [PROMPT] in the [TARGETLANGUAGE]. The [PROMPT] will be formatted like this:
[Location - type of place or characteristic that is preferred]
Include a global caveat/disclosure of the dates you have available to you for data so people can understand if they get outdated results. Also include the address for each item in the list.
title: Bar/Restaurant Recommender
